Name: Expocaf√© Zamen
Review Text: Words can't describe how amazing this place is. What a little Gem in a unlikely spot. Had a fantastic brunch and great coffee. Definitely cant recommend highly enough. Thank you

Name: Expocaf√© Zamen
Review Text: This place is an absolute gem. We just ate the tastiest club sandwich Inhave ever taatwd in my life! Beautifully prepared, delicious coffee too, all in a spacious, arty environment. Highly recommended!

Name: Expocaf√© Zamen
Review Text: Amazing food and good service. A cute little hidden gem, looking forward to trying other items on the menu.

Name: Expocaf√© Zamen
Review Text: Nice place and the owner was really pleasant and made you feel welcome. She also cooks a mean breakfast. Also, live music which was a bonus. Loved this place.

Name: Expocaf√© Zamen
Review Text: The best hidden spot of Amsterdam in a very authentic environment. Soul food and a place with a heart and pure character. This is the place I love, where I can relax and be myself.

Name: Expocaf√© Zamen
Review Text: Club sandwich will soak up any vodka party in your belly. It's a life saver.
